summary: I got tired of the dark blank pit in the middle of the Riften Marketplace, So I created this mod that adds a burning firepit to the center of the marketplace!
descriptionHtml:
I got tired of the dark blank pit in the middle of the Riften Marketplace, So I created this mod that adds a burning firepit to the center of the marketplace! If you enjoy dont forget to rate!

The only mods that might interfere with this mod, are mods that add objects to this pit! (What a mouthful lol) 

On Steam Workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=166518985

Mod by InfctedMushr00m 

Connect with me: 
http://www.youtube.com/InfctedMushr00m 
http://www.twitch.tv/infcted 
http://twitter.com/InfctedMushr00m 

Enjoy:)
author: InfctedMushr00m
